sentences.sContent: We urgently need more assistance from donor countries (= countries that give money, food etc to help in poor countries or disaster areas ) .
sentences.sCn: 我们急需捐赠国的更多援助。

sentences.sContent: An anonymous donor (= whose name is unknown ) has given £500 towards the restoration fund.
sentences.sCn: 一位匿名捐赠者向重建基金捐了500英镑。

phrases.pCn: 施主能级供体部位；给位；施主能级
n. 献血者，供血者；给血者

trans.tranOther: a person, group etc that gives something, especially money, to help an organization or country

trans.tranCn: 捐献的；经人工授精出生的
trans.tranOther: Donor organs or parts are organs or parts of the body which people allow doctors to use to help people who are ill
